sentences.sContent: It evaluates the basic viability of the project.
sentences.sContent_eng: It evaluates the basic viability of the project.
sentences.sCn: 它估计了项目的基本生存能力。

sentences.sContent: At this first, or highest level of change, you seek to establish the opportunity and agree to the viability of the approach.
sentences.sContent_eng: At this first, or highest level of change, you seek to establish the opportunity and agree to the viability of the approach.
sentences.sCn: 在变化的第一层或是最高层，您寻找机会去创建世纪，对方法的生存能力达成一致看法。

synos.tran: [生物]生存能力，发育能力；可行性

phrases.pCn: 经济可行性，经济生存能力

words.tran: 可行的；能养活的；能生育的
